burn.name: Burn
burn.description:
Blockable. Decreases by 1 every turn. 
The user loses 4% of their health for each turn this is active. 
Nullified out by chill effects.

stun.name: Stun
stun.description:
Blockable. Decreases by 1 every turn. 
The user's attack's accuracy will decrease by 20% while active.

poison.name: Poison
poison.description:
Blockable. Decreases by 1 every turn. 
Drains 1 stamina from the user each turn.

recover.name: Recover
recover.description:
Blockable. Decreases by 1 every turn. 
The user gains 4% of their max health per turn.

curse.name: Curse
curse.description:
Unblockable. Never decreases. 
Stays on the user, though it doesn't do anything by itself.

bullseye.name: Bullseye
bullseye.description:
Blockable. Decreases by 1 every turn. 
The user's attack's accuracy will increase by 30% while active.

berserk.name: Berserk
berserk.description:
Blockable. Decreases by 1 every turn. 
The users regular damage will increase 15% for every Berserk effect they have while active.

chill.name: Chill
chill.description:
Blockable. Decreases by 1 every turn. 
Doesn't do anything by itself. If a user has 7 or more Chill effects at the end of a turn, they will turn into 1 Freeze effect. 
Cancelled out by burn effects.

freeze.name: Freeze
freeze.description:
Unblockable. Decreases by 1 every turn. 
Force the user to skip a turn while active. 
Frozen users are immune to chill effects while this lasts.

restore.name: Restore
restore.description:
Blockable. Decreases by 1 every turn. 
Generates 1 extra energy for the user each turn.

seriate.name: Seriate
seriate.description:
Unblockable. Never decreases. 
If the user is carrying this effect, for every neutral card they play, they will gain 1 extra Seriate effect. The neutral cards' stats will increase by 2% for every Seriate effect they have.

feeble.name: Feeble
feeble.description:
Blockable. Decreases by 1 every turn. 
The user's damage is reduced by 1.1^-(amount of Feeble effects)*100% while active.
